title: Flag of Georgia
cardDescription: The flag of Georgia is a white rectangle, with in its central portion a large red cross. In the four corners there are four Bolnur-Katskhuri crosses of the same color.
description: The flag of Georgia is a white rectangle, with in its central portion a large red cross. In the four corners there are four Bolnur-Katskhuri crosses of the same color.

content: Proportion:
Finished size:
Hook size:
14cm x 8cm
3,5 mm
Yarn:
White (as A)
Red (as B)
/crochet-pattern-images/european-flags/flag-of-georgia.png

content.content: The finished size of this flag does not correlate with official proportions as well as I hoped, but it was more important to get all the five crosses to be symmetrical.
This pattern is worked horizontally starting from the middle left and doing top and bottom parts separately. Also note that the starting chain is counted as row 1.

content: With B, ch 28
Sc in 2nd ch from hook, sc 25, sba, turn
Ch 1, sc 11, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 12, turn
Ch 1, sc 11, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 12, turn
Ch 1, sc 5, sab, sba, sc 4, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 4, sab, sba, sc 6, turn
Ch 1, sc 4, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 3, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 3, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 5, turn
Ch 1, sc 5, sab, sba, sc 4, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 4, sab, sba, sc 6, turn
Ch 1, sc 11, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 12, turn
Ch 1, sc 11, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 12, fasten off
attach B to first ch row 1, ch 1, sc 26, sba, turn
Ch 1, sc 11, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 12, turn
Ch 1, sc 11, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 12, turn
Ch 1, sc 5, sab, sba, sc 4, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 4, sab, sba, sc 6, turn
Ch 1, sc 4, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 3, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 3, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 5, turn
Ch 1, sc 5, sab, sba, sc 4, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 4, sab, sba, sc 6, turn
Ch 1, sc 11, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 12, turn
Ch 1, sc 11, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 12, turn
